userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been assigned to the Performing Arts Special Collections, UCLA. All requests for permission to publish or quote from manuscripts must be submitted in writing to the Arts Special Collections Librarian. Permission for publication is given on behalf of the Arts Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission of the copyright holder, which must also be obtained.

Professional activities

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of of material related to the career of scree n writer Waldo Salt. Includes correspondence, scripts, research, and personal pa pers. Personal materials include biographical information, family, legal, financ ial and medical papers, writings by and about Salt, projects not authored by Sal t, photographs, and artwork.
